channel.title: Trailer Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 1.1.2
item.description: • Added option for displaying PR labels in preferences

item.title: Version 1.1.1
item.description:
• Additional updates and cleanups from v1.1.0:
  • New support for multiple API servers, with optional error reporting per-server
  • API server settings should no longer reset after updates

item.title: Version 1.1.0
item.description:
• New support for multiple API servers, with optional error reporting per-server
  • API server settings should no longer reset after updates

item.title: Version 1.0.40
item.description:
• Correct status item appearance in all themes & display modes (including dark mode in Yosemite)
  • Inaccessible repositories will no longer be repeatedly reported every time watchlists are refreshed
  • PR dragging improvements
  • Sparkle auto-updater bumped up to v1.8
